body: You now have a better way to learn about new features to the Lamden Wallet!
Visit the 'What's New' section to check it out!
changes: Mainnet transaction result links now point to TauHQ.
fixes: Bug fixes prevent IDE crashes and UI freezes.
new_features: This! A new interface to communicate features, updates and announcements.
Accounts now show which Dapp is connected to it by displaying the Dapp's icon.
Added a 'max' button to the amount input box when making transfers.
title: New Features and Bug Fixes

body: A major update to the Lamden Wallet which is now rebranded as Lamden Vault!
The main change is now the addition of Vault wallets that are BIP39/36 compliant. This allows backing up the entire Lamden Vault with a 24-word seed phrase.
Create your new Lamden Vault right now!
changes: New accounts can only be created through the Lamden Vault.
new_features: New and refreshed look including a rebrand to Lamden Vault.
Lamden Vault now supports BIP39 Wallets (HD Wallets) as the main way to make accounts and back up the wallet.
New Manage Networks section where you can add other Lamden networks.
title: Introducing Lamden Vault!

body: We implemented some user feedback from the Vault release.
changes: Removed transaction history (to return one day). Replaced with a button which opens your tx history on TauHQ.com.
new_features: Restore Seed Phrase will now validate the words entered vs the BIP39 word list.
The ability to add non-standard Seed Phrases.
title: Fixes and Small Changes

body: Many users reported the wallet would report all transactions as successful regardless of the real result. This has been fixed.
fixes: Currency symbol for custom networks now show correctly in wallet UI.
title: Bug Fixes

body: The wallet will now show fiat balances in a few major world currencies. Some other small changes and UI fixes.
changes: The account details screens have been removed as they were viewed as redundant.
new_features: The transaction popup now allows stamps to be edited.
Can now choose data type for the 'Any' KWARG.
title: Fiat balances!

body: Lamden V2 is here! We have launched a V2 Testnet which you can find in the network dropdown.
Transactions will now estimate how many stamps your transaction will take, so no more guessing!
fixes: Fixed transactions hanging and not reporting success or failure.
new_features: Stamp Estimation for transactions also allows the wallet to get the expected result of the transaction and let you know why it will fail before you run it!
title: Testnet V2 Now Live!

fixes: Fixed Github Issue #265 which was a UI bug when switching between tokens in the create tx dialoge.
Made it so a user cannot initiate a transaction if they don't have TAU in their wallet.
Fixed how the wallet encodes Lists into transactions.
Added a 10% buffer to the stamp estimation in case the node network determines a higher stamp amount than the estimator.
title: Hotfix v2.3.1

body: Wallet can now connect to DAPPS using V2 networks.
fixes: Manage Networks button from the networks dropdown works again.
Fixed DAPP connections when connecting to a V2 network.
title: Hotfix v2.3.2

body: This is a new and cool update!
fixes: Bug fixes prevent IDE crashes and UI freezes.
new_features: This! A new interface to communicate features, updates and announcements.
Accounts now show which Dapp is connected to it by displaying the Dapp's icon.
Added a 'max' button to the amount input box when making transfers.
title: New Features and Bug Fixes
